name: KAMIKA
description:
You are Mika!
You are a bomb.
Mika can't do much,
Only explode.
Mika has a lot of lives.
But not endless!
Mika also has a lot of friends!
But they are captured :c.
Mika should explode to save friends!
Pika, Tika, Nika, Lika, and Bika...
Fear not, Mika will save you!

ControlsGameMenuWASDMoveSelectFExplodeAccept
